Html:
Hi All;

Visual Studio 2010 seems confused when converting NerdDinner 1.0. The Conversion Report says everything converted fine. But the Solution Explorer says NerdDinner project is (unavailable).

Does somebody already have NerdDinner 1.1 for vs2k10?

Thanks,
Dale E. Moore

I was able to get it working by removing the first guid from the ProjectTypeGuids line of the project file and then updating all the MVC assembly references to 2.0.0.0 from 1.0.0.0.  Compiled and ran like a charm after that...  FYI, this is my first exposure to .Net and the MS platform in general so I'm guessing there may be a 'better' way, but it worked for me.

Sorry, this is the tool for the conversion you did manually.
http://weblogs.asp.net/leftslipper/archive/2009/11/23/migrating-asp-net-mvc-1-0-applications-to-asp-net-mvc-2-beta-updated.aspx

I've been out of town, sorry I missed this.

Thanks dotbombjoe and shanselman;

MvcAppConverter ran fine then vs10 converted the results on the next open. Project NerdDinner.Tests gets

 

Error 1 The type name 'MembershipUser' could not be found. This type has been forwarded to assembly 'System.Web.ApplicationServices, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35'. Consider adding a reference to that assembly. C:\Users\DaleM\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\NerdDinnerConvertedByMVCc\NerdDinner.Tests\Controllers\AccountControllerTest.cs 388 43 NerdDinner.Tests

Error 1 The type name 'MembershipUser' could not be found. This type has been forwarded to assembly 'System.Web.ApplicationServices, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35'. Consider adding a reference to that assembly. C:\Users\DaleM\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\NerdDinnerConvertedByMVCc\NerdDinner.Tests\Controllers\AccountControllerTest.cs 388 43 NerdDinner.Tests

And the test projects can't have their framework changed. But, project NerdDinner launches even with those 11 errors.
I very much appreciate your help!
Dale E. Moore

I too have this error after converting my asp.net mvc 2 application from vs2008 to vs2010 within my unit test application

Error    1    The type name 'MembershipUser' could not be found. This type has been forwarded to assembly 'System.Web.ApplicationServices, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35'. Consider adding a reference to that assembly.    C:\Projects\RealEstate\RealEstate.Tests\Controllers\AccountControllerTest.cs    428    43    RealEstate.Tests

 

Update...

Actually I resolved this issue by adding a reference to System.Web.ApplicationServices within my unit test application.

Thanks
Take a look at the Source Control tab here in CodePlex, we've converted the sample to MVC 2 and VS2010.
